Option: msg:"OS-MOBILE Apple iPhone User-Agent detected"; flow:established,to_server; http_header; content:"User-Agent|3A|"; content:"iPhone",distance 0,fast_pattern; pcre:"/^User-Agent\x3a[^\r\n]*iPhone/"; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop,ruleset community; service:http; classtype:policy-violation; sid:25520; rev:5;
